data.title: 饼图显示问题，中间有一条细线
data.code:
app.title = '环形图'; option = { tooltip: { trigger: 'item', formatter: "{a}
{b}: {c} ({d}%)" }, legend: { orient: 'vertical', x: 'left', data:['直接访问','邮件营销','联盟广告','视频广告','搜索引擎','搜索引擎1','搜索引擎2'] }, series: [ { "type":"pie", "radius":["10%","35%"], "data":[ {"value":23011,"name":"直接访问"}, {"value":8303,"name":"邮件营销"}, {"value":7355,"name":"联盟广告"}, {"value":2966,"name":"视频广告"}, {"value":2619,"name":"搜索引擎"}, {"value":25,"name":"搜索引擎1"}, {"value":16,"name":"搜索引擎2"}, ], "label":{ "normal":{ "position":"outside", "formatter":"{b}\n{d}%" } }, } ] };
